GSP33yasasi_u:7: (vyākhyā) īṣṭe viśvasya nityaṃ vyapagatatulanāyogyavastvantaro yo vidye yasyādhigatyai vidurupaniṣado dve parāṃ cāparāṃ ca /
GSP33yasasi_u:8: yo viśvasvāntavāsī prathayati ca dhiyaṃ tasya tasyānurūpāṃ devaḥ śrīmān sa mahyaṃ pradiśatu dayayā dhīvikāsaṃ samantāt // 1 //
GSP33yasasi_u:16: advaitino hisadeva somyedamagra āsīdekamevādvitīyamiti kāraṇībhūtasya sacchabditasya
GSP33yasasi_u:24: yadvā uttarārdhe tacchadbaḥ prasiddhaparāmarśī na tu yacchabdanirdiṣṭapratinirdeśarūpaḥ /
GSP33yasasi_u:35: anyatve sadṛśatve vā dvitīyaṃ sidhyati dhruvam // 4 //
GSP33yasasi_u:36: advitīyapadasya tatpuruṣavṛttatve na dvitīyasya bādha ityāhapūrvasmin ityādinā ślokacatuṣṭayena /
GSP33yasasi_u:37: tatpuruṣa iti prathamakalpe tāvaduttarapadārthaḥ prādhānyena vivakṣyate,
GSP33yasasi_u:41: nañtatpuruṣe cāropitatvasya pūrvapadārthatvaṃ tasya cottarapadārthaviśeṣaṇatvamiṣyate śābdikaiḥ /
GSP33yasasi_u:44: nañivayuktamanyasadṛśādhikaraṇe tathā hyarthagatiriti ca śābdikānāṃ paribhāṣā /
GSP33yasasi_u:45: tathā cādvitīyapadenāropitadvitīyatvavadbrahmeti bodhe tatra dvitīyānyatvasya dvitīyasadṛśatvasya dvitīyaviruddhatvasya vā pratītiḥ phalati
GSP33yasasi_u:47: dvitīyapratiyogikasya bhedasya sādṛśyasya vā pratibodhane pratiyogitayā dvitīyasiddherniṣpratyūhatvāditi bhāvaḥ // 3 //4 //
GSP33yasasi_u:48: viruddhatve dvitīyena tṛtīyaṃ prathamaṃ tu vā /
GSP33yasasi_u:50: nanvevamapi dvitīyaviruddhatve brahmaṇo bodhite kathaṃ na dvitīyasya bādha ityatrāhaviruddhatvaiti /
GSP33yasasi_u:53: sa ca dharmaḥ prathamatvaṃ niyamataḥ tṛtīyatvādi vā /
GSP33yasasi_u:73: tato 'nyattadviruddhaṃ vā sadṛśaṃ vātra vakti saḥ // 8 //
GSP33yasasi_u:98: viśeṣaṇe vā tadbrahma tṛtīyaṃ prathamaṃ tu vā // 11 //
GSP33yasasi_u:108: tṛtīyaṃ tadabhāvatvaviśeṣaṇamiti prathamatvaṃ tṛtīyatvaṃ vā brahmaṇo 'varjanīyamityuttarārdhārthaḥ /
GSP33yasasi_u:111: brahmaṇaḥ prathamā ye ca tṛtīyādyā jagatrtraye // 12 //
GSP33yasasi_u:113: kiñca tatra bahuvrīhau samāse saṃśrite sati // 13 //
GSP33yasasi_u:120: nāsti dvitīyaṃ yasya tadbrahmetyatra pakṣe vigrahaḥ /
GSP33yasasi_u:122: tathā ca brahmaṇa eva dvitīyatvaṃ labhyeta /
GSP33yasasi_u:123: tataśca brahmāpekṣayā prathamasya tṛtīyādeśca na bādho 'dvitīyaśrutyetyarthaḥ /
GSP33yasasi_u:130: dvitve ca yacchabdārthasya brahmaṇo niṣṭhatvasaṃbandhonānvayo nopeyate;
GSP33yasasi_u:134: yato brahmaṇo bhinnaṃ nāsti tadbrahmādvitīyamiti dvitīyabādho 'dvitīyaśrutyā labhyata evetyatrāhakiñceti /
GSP33yasasi_u:143: yasyeti ṣaṣṭhī prakṛtyarthānviter'thāntarasaṃbandhe prāmāṇike sati saṅgacchate /
GSP33yasasi_u:144: nirviśeṣe ca brahmaṇi prakṛtyarthe padārthāntarasaṃbandhasyāsatyatvāt ṣaṣṭhībahuvrīhiśca prakṛte na ghaṭata ityarthaḥ // 12 //13 //14 //
GSP33yasasi_u:147: rāhoḥ śira ityādāvabhede 'pi ṣaṣṭhyā dṛṣṭeryadabhinno dvitīyābhāvastadadvitīyaṃ brahmeti vivakṣāṃ pratikṣepati,dvitīyeti /
GSP33yasasi_u:148: asataḥ satpadārthābhedastadviśeṣaṇatvamapi na yujyate iti bhāvaḥ // 15 //
GSP33yasasi_u:172: prathamato brahmaṇo gaṇane kṛte tena saha gaṇanārhe dvitīyaḥ samo vādhiko vā padārthaḥ kālatraye 'pi nāstītyarthaḥ /
GSP33yasasi_u:181: tathā cānugṛhītaṃ śatadūṣaṇyāṃ śrīmadvedāntadeśikacaraṇaiḥasmatpakṣe tu vṛttidvayamapi samyak /
GSP33yasasi_u:187: mukhyasyaiva prathamaparigaṇanasya loke śāstre ca dṛṣṭeḥ /
GSP33yasasi_u:188: kavikulagaṇanāprasaṅge kālidāsasyaiva hi prāthamyena gaṇanaṃ kavilokaprasiddham /
GSP33yasasi_u:195: samasyaiva dvitīyagaṇanāyogyatvamityāśayamūlakaṃ capurā kavīnāmitiślokasyottarārdhaṃ paripaṭhyate adyāpi tattulyakaverabhāvādanāmikā sār'thavatī babhūvaiti /
GSP33yasasi_u:196: tathā ca bahuvrīhivṛttyā samaniṣedhaḥ phalati brahmaṇa iti /
GSP33yasasi_u:197: muktānāmapi bhogamātrasāmyamiti na brahmaṇā saha gaṇanaṃ mukhyaparigaṇanaprastāve yuktam /
GSP33yasasi_u:198: tanmukhyaṃ vastu vastuto brahmaikameveti advitīyatvaṃ tasya pratitiṣṭhatīti ca bodhyam /
GSP33yasasi_u:200: na tatsamaścābhyadhikaśca dṛśyate iti śrutyantarānusārātna tvatsamo 'styabhyadhikaḥ
GSP33yasasi_u:201: kuto 'nyo lokatraye 'pyapratimaprabhāva ityupabṛṃhaṇānusārāccaidamarthyameva tasya nyāyyamiti hārdam /
GSP33yasasi_u:203: colanṛpasyāsthānapaṇḍitaṃ vijityavādāhaverājāsanaṃ rājyārdhaṃ ca tatsamarpitamadhigatavanta ime paramācāryāḥ pūrvāśrame /
GSP33yasasi_u:210: tā veṣṇavamahāvibhūtyarṇavaviśīryamāṇa jalakaṇikāyamānāḥ tadadvitīyatvaśrutyā na bādhyanta iti yāvat /
GSP33yasasi_u:211: aupaniṣadaṃ paraṃ tattvaṃ paraṃ brahma śrīmannārāyaṇa eveti ca viṣṇoriti nirdeśena jñāpitam // 17 // 18 // 19 // 20 //21 //22 //
GSP33yasasi_u:214: yathaika eva savitā na dvitīyo nabhaḥsthale /
GSP33yasasi_u:215: ityuktā na hi sāvitrā niṣidhyante 'tra raśmayaḥ // 24 //
GSP33yasasi_u:219: tatsvarūpāntargatasya tena saha gaṇanāyoga ityatredaṃ nidarśanam ,
GSP33yasasi_u:221: guṇasya guṇinā saha gaṇanāyoga ityatrayathā pradhāneti /
GSP33yasasi_u:226: saṅkhyeyadravyagaṇanāyāṃ saṅkhyeyo 'nyaḥ padārtho yathā gaṇyate na tathā tadguṇabhūtā saṅkhyā tena saha gaṇyata ityarthaḥ /
GSP33yasasi_u:229: tathā, pādo 'sya viśvā bhūtāni tripādasyāmṛtaṃ divi /
GSP33yasasi_u:234: yathā brahmaguṇatvaṃ sidhyejjagataḥ tathaiva brahmāṃśatvaṃ pratipādayacchrutijātaṃ sarvaṃ jagata brahmāpṛthaksiddhaprakāratve vyavārthāpayadityarthaḥ
GSP33yasasi_u:238: tathā, etāvānasya mahimā tato jyāyastaro hi saḥ /
GSP33yasasi_u:245: mahimā ityanena jagato vibhūtitvaṃ brahmaṇo 'tiśayāvahatvādguṇatvaṃ ca jñāyate /
GSP33yasasi_u:246: tato jyāyāṃśca pūruṣa iti brahmaṇo jagadapekṣayātivailakṣaṇyaṃ ca /
GSP33yasasi_u:247: ato na brahmasvarūpaikadeśatā mṛdaṃśateva tatpariṇāmaghaṭāderjagato yuktā /
GSP33yasasi_u:250: yatra viśiṣṭe brahmaṇi samanubhūyamāne 'nyatsvatantraṃ vastu na paśyati,
GSP33yasasi_u:253: sarvaprakārakaḥ sarvātmā paraṃ brahma paramapuruṣo nārāyaṇa eva bhūmā,
GSP33yasasi_u:255: svaniṣṭhaprañcadarśananindayā ca brahmaniṣṭhatvameva tasya gamyata ityāśayena śrutyantaramupādatte udaramiti /
GSP33yasasi_u:258: etasmin prapañce daramalpamapi antaramantarālaṃ brahmasaṃbandhavicchedaṃ yadā paśyati tadaivāsyaivaṃ jānataḥ saṃsārabhayamupasthitamagre bhavatītyarthaḥ
GSP33yasasi_u:259: paraprakriyācchāyayaivamatrārtho vivakṣito bhedamithyātvaṃ na sidhyatyetadvākyata iti bodhanāya /
GSP33yasasi_u:260: paramātmani niṣṭhāśabditasya dhruvānusmaraṇasya pūrvavākyaprastutasyālpakālavicchede 'pi saṃsārabhayaprasaṅga eveti tu siddhāntisammator'thaḥ
GSP33yasasi_u:267: nanu virukteṣu vacaneṣu brahmavibhūtitvādau jagataḥ pratipādite 'pi vacanāntareṣu
GSP33yasasi_u:268: kāraṇamātrasya satyatvam anyasya sarvasyāsatyatvaṃ ca pratīyate iti tadanurodheneṣāṃ
GSP33yasasi_u:274: vācā'sambhaṇaṃ vikāro nāmadheyaṃ mṛttiketyeva satyamiti cchāndogye ṣaṣṭhaprapāṭhake /
GSP33yasasi_u:282: kena spṛṣṭamityākāṅkṣāyāṃntvetha yathā somyaikena mṛtpiṇḍeneti pūrvaprakṛto mṛtpiṇḍo yogyatvātkartṛtayānveti /
GSP33yasasi_u:283: ghaṭatvādyavasthārūpo vikāraḥ tattadavasthāyogaprayuktaṃ ghaṭādināma ca mṛtpiṇḍenaiva gṛhītaṃ vākpūrvakavyavahārāyeti phalitam /
GSP33yasasi_u:284: evaṃ kāraṇadravyasyaiva nānāvasthābhāktvena nānākāryātmakatvātkāryāṇāṃ kāraṇānanyatvamityāhamṛttiketyeva satyamiti /
GSP33yasasi_u:290: ekavijñānena sarvavijñānapratijñopapādanārthaṃ pravṛttatvādasya vākyasyopādānopādeyayorananyatva eva tātparyamuktadiśā /
GSP33yasasi_u:292: tathā sati sarvasya jñātavyasyābhāvādeva sarvaṃ jñātaṃ syādityasaṅgatamāpadyeta /
GSP33yasasi_u:300: so 'yaṃ śarīrātmabhāvo jagadbrahmaṇoḥsadāyatanāḥ aitadātmyamidaṃ sarvamiti nirdiṣṭaḥ /
GSP33yasasi_u:305: tadidameva prāmāṇikamiti cocyate etadātmyamidaṃ sarvaṃ tatsatyamityekavākyatayānvayāt /
GSP33yasasi_u:307: paravyākhyācchāyayā tu tadbrahma satyaṃ sadaikarūpamityartho varṇitaḥ /
GSP33yasasi_u:313: pāpakādvyucca ritānāṃ visphuliṅgānāmagnyaṃśatvenāgnyananyatvavadbrahmaṇa udbhūtasya prapañcasyāpi brahmāṃśabhūtasya brahmānanyatvameva vivakṣitam
GSP33yasasi_u:314: idaṃ cānanyatvaṃ mṛdādidṛṣṭāntaiśca śrutiṣu nirūpitamiti yāvat // 30 //
GSP33yasasi_u:324: nanuuta tamādeśamaprākṣyoyenāśrataṃ śrutaṃ bhavatīti pratijñātamekavijñānena sarvavijñānaṃ brahmaṇa ekasyaiva pāramārthye ghaṭate /
GSP33yasasi_u:327: brahmaṇo nikhilajagadantarātmatvena nikhilajagatpradhānatayā nikhilasya ca taccharīratvena
GSP33yasasi_u:328: tatprakārataikasvarūpatayā tasmin jñāte tadanantargataṃ kimapi jñātavyaṃ mukhyaṃ
GSP33yasasi_u:329: nāvaśiṣyata iti ekavijñānena sarvavijñāvākyasyārtha iti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33yasasi_u:331: niruktārthaparaiḥ śrutivacanaistanmūlopabṛṃhaṇasmṛtivacanaiśca brahmātmakatvena labdhasvarūpaḥ prapañca ityeva bodhyate /
GSP33yasasi_u:332: na tu brahmaṇo vibhūtibhūtaḥ sa niṣidhyata ityarthaḥ /
GSP33yasasi_u:337: tatra ca ātmano lābhaḥ ātmalābhaḥ-svarūpasattā brahmatmatayā-brahmatmakatvena ātmalābho yasyeti bahuvrīhiḥ /
GSP33yasasi_u:338: brahmāvibhūtibhūtasya prapañcasya na niṣedhaḥ kṛtaḥ śāstreṣviti nirūpitametāvatā // 32 //33 //
GSP33yasasi_u:342: prapañcaniṣedhe vivakṣite śāstravacanataḥ tattadarthaviśeṣapratipādanopādānādyarthāḥ sarve vyavahārā laukikā vaidikāśca lupyeran-aprāmāṇikā visaṃvādinaśca bhaveyuḥ,
GSP33yasasi_u:345: brahmabhinnasarvamithyātve brahmaviṣayakadhiya aupaniṣadyā apivilopo 'satyatā prasajyata ityarthaḥ /
GSP33yasasi_u:349: nanu paramārthadṛṣṭyā brahmabhinnasya sarvasya mithyātve 'pi tataḥ prāk avidyātaḥ pramāṇaprameyavyavahārādi nirūhyata iti cettatrāhavyāvahāriketi
GSP33yasasi_u:351: vyāvahārikasattayā pramāṇaprameyavyavahāropapādane vyāvahārikapramāṇabhāvena śrutyādinā janitā parabrahmabuddhirapi bhavatabhimatā vyāvahārikārthamātragocarā bhavet ;
GSP33yasasi_u:354: etadviṣaye pūrvācāryaiḥ sūribhireva parākrāntaṃ nitarāmiti visamyate 'treti bodhyam // 35 //
GSP33yasasi_u:365: nanu sattve prapañcasya nāstīti pratyayaḥ katham /
GSP33yasasi_u:366: asattve vā kathaṃ tasminnastīti pratyayo bhavet // 37 //
GSP33yasasi_u:368: atha tasya sadasadanirvacanīyatvamapi parābhimataṃ nirasituṃ vicāramupakramate nanu sattve iti /
GSP33yasasi_u:369: sattve prapañcasya nāstīti bādhaviṣayatvaṃ kathaṃ ghaṭatetyākṣepo mādhyamikādīnām /
GSP33yasasi_u:371: asattve sadbuddhibodhyatvaṃ pratipannaṃ tasya kathaṃ ghaṭeteti // 37 //
GSP33yasasi_u:385: sadasattvayoḥ pratīyayormadhye ekasyaiva nirṇaye hetvabhāvādyathāpratīti prapañcasyobhayamevaiṣṭavyamiti janā āsthitā ityarthaḥ /
GSP33yasasi_u:399: ca viruddhaṃ dharmadvayaṃ parityajya na sat nāpyasaditi sadasadanirvacaniyaṃ prapañca
GSP33yasasi_u:405: vibhaktadeśakālādiviśeṣataḥ sattvamasattvaṃ ca pratītaṃ vyavasthitaṃ ghaṭāderghaṭata eveti bhāvo 'mīṣām // 42 //
GSP33yasasi_u:412: tatra pakṣāntarāṇāṃ sadoṣatvapratipādanapūrvakaṃ sopādhikasattvāsattvapakṣo mīmāṃsakābhimato nirṇīyate sadyuktyeti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33yasasi_u:426: yadvā pratītiḥ sattvamasattvaṃ ca nirūpādhi yadi pratyapādayiṣyat ,
GSP33yasasi_u:437: tataḥ siddhānte viśeṣaśca śatadūṣaṇyāṃ vyavriyata ṣaṣṭitame vāde śrīmannigamāntācāryacaraṇaiḥ /
GSP33yasasi_u:445: iha tādātmyaṃ saṃsargo vā sattvamiti vyapadiśyate /
GSP33yasasi_u:447: ṣaṣṭhe tu pakṣe viruddhadharmayoga eva vastunyasadvyavahārahetutayā vyapadiśyate /
GSP33yasasi_u:448: ghaṭo hi ghaṭātmanā san paṭātmanā punarasanniti nirdiśyate /
GSP33yasasi_u:454: tathā ayaṃ paṭo nāstītyatra paṭatādātmyābhāvalakṣaṇā paṭātmanāsattā pratīyate /
GSP33yasasi_u:455: tatra tadā ghaṭo nāstītyatra ca taddeśakālasaṃyogābhāvalakṣaṇāsattā pratīyate /
GSP33yasasi_u:458: yathā ghaṭatvameva hi ayaṃ ghaṭo 'stītyatra pratītaṃ ghaṭasya sattvam /
GSP33yasasi_u:460: evaṃ svadeśakālasaṃbandhalakṣaṇā sattaivānyadeśakālanāstitāpratītāvapi viṣayo bhavati deśāntarādisaṃbandhābhāvatveneti /
GSP33yasasi_u:461: tathā ca dharmaviśeṣa eva bhāvānāmastināstipratītigocara iti siddham /
GSP33yasasi_u:468: uktaṃ ca - ādāvante ca yannāsti nāsti madhye 'pi tattathā iti /
GSP33yasasi_u:470: avirodhena sadasattvasamarthanasamahamānaḥ sattvaikāntyavādī kāpilo 'tra pratyavatiṣṭhate nanu deśādīti /
GSP33yasasi_u:475: ataḥ sattvameva sadā mantavyaṃ bhāvānāmitisataḥ sattvaṃ sadā bhavedityantasyārthaḥ /
GSP33yasasi_u:478: asataḥ prayatnaśatenāpi niṣpattyā sattvaṃ durupapādaṃ sikatābhyastailasyeva /
GSP33yasasi_u:502: anvayavyatirekābhyāṃ ca kārakacakrasya tasya tasya tatra tatra kārye sāmarthyaniyamaḥ sidhyatīti nātiprasaṅgaḥ /
GSP33yasasi_u:514: tacca pratītibādhābhyāṃ sadasadvilakṣaṇatvasiddheḥ supratiṣṭhitamiti hi māyāvādināṃ matam /
GSP33yasasi_u:519: nirviśeṣacinmātrabrahmātmaikyaṃ catattvamasivākyapratipannamiti vādamadvaitināṃ pratikṣeptuṃ tattvamasivākyārthavicāramupakramate śvetaketumiti
GSP33yasasi_u:523: asyāpi samānādhikaraṇavākyasya mukhyārthatvaṃ tanmate na saṃbhavatītyahatasyetyādinā // 51 //
GSP33yasasi_u:532: samānavibhaktyā pratipannamaikyaṃ jīveśvarayorviruddhasvabhāvayorna ghaṭata iti mukhyārthāsaṃbhava evetyāśayaḥ // 52 //
GSP33yasasi_u:548: upalakṣaṇatve 'pi ajñatvādinopalakṣyasya jīvabhāvasya sarvajñatvādinopalakṣyasyeśvarabhāvasya ca vaiyadhikaraṇyādeva tvantadarthayoraikyaṃ na sidhyatītyarthaḥ // 54 //
GSP33yasasi_u:553: yathā so 'yaṃ raurityatra tattedantopalakṣite vastumātre lakṣaṇā padadvayasya tatheti śaṅkate vācyeti /
GSP33yasasi_u:554: vācyaikadeśasya pravṛttinimittabhedasya tyāgena viśeṣyamātre cinmātre padadvayasya vṛttiḥ jahadajahallakṣaṇayeti /
GSP33yasasi_u:563: tattāviśiṣṭe idantānvayasya bādhe 'pi ekasmin dharmiṇyubhayānvaye na virodhaḥ /
GSP33yasasi_u:566: prātipadikābhyāṃ deśadvayakāladvayasaṃbandhasya samānavibhaktyā tadāśrayadravyaikyasya ca pratipādane na virodhaleśo 'pi /
GSP33yasasi_u:571: na tvevaṃ bhavatā vaktuṃ śakyata ityāhasvaprakāśasyeti /
GSP33yasasi_u:572: nirviśeṣe cinmātre viruddhadharmadvayasambandhasyāvirodhopapādakaṃ deśakālāvasthābhedādau kiñcidapi na ghaṭate /
GSP33yasasi_u:576: brahmaṇyavidyānvayāyogādevāvidyākṛtabhedadarśananirasanārthatvaṃ śāstrasya nirviśeṣacinmātra brahmātmaikyaviṣayatvaṃ ca parābhimataṃ na saṃbhavītyāhanirdhūteti
GSP33yasasi_u:579: na ca nirviśeṣe svaprakāśe ca tatprasaktiḥ /
GSP33yasasi_u:589: cinmātre brahmaṇyavidyānvayānupapattiparyālocanayā kaiścidadvaitibhiḥ kalpitaṃ māyāvidyopādhibhedaṃ tata eveśeśitavyabhedaṃ cāparamārthamupapādyamānaṃ nirasyatieteneti /
GSP33yasasi_u:593: tattvamasivākyajanyaikyasākṣātkāreṇa māyāvidyopādhināśe tatkalpita īśajīvabhāvo 'pi nivṛtto nāvatiṣṭhata ityarthaḥ /
GSP33yasasi_u:599: aikyajñānena nivṛttyupagame 'pi tasya kṣaṇikatvādeva punarapi brahmasvarūpabalāttayoḥ kalpanāprasaṅgaḥ /
GSP33yasasi_u:600: kiñca māyāyā bhrāntijanakatve duḥkhādijanakatve cāvidyāto vibhāgāsiddhiḥ /
GSP33yasasi_u:603: avidyāyā eva bahusaṃmatatvānmāyāvidyopādhibhedavādino 'mī kṣudrā brahmavido 'dvaitiṣviti ca bodhyam // 59 //60 //
GSP33yasasi_u:613: niraṃśe cinmātre māyāvidyāsambandhe tatprayuktasvabhāvabhedā ekasminneva prasajyante iti jīveśvarasvabhāvasāṅkaryaprasaṅgaḥ /
GSP33yasasi_u:618: kiñca māyayāvidyayā vā saṃvitsvarūpasya cchedāsambhavādekameva tattadupahitaṃ bhavedgaganamiva maṭhāntavartighaṭena maṭhena copahitam /
GSP33yasasi_u:619: tathā ca hastapādādyavacchinnasukhaduḥkhabhoga ekasyaiva yathā jīvasya,
GSP33yasasi_u:620: tathā tattadupādhiprayuktaiśvaryaduḥkhādibhoga ekasyaiva brahmaṇaḥ prasajyata iti jīvaparasvabhāvāvyavasthitirevetyarthaḥ // 61 //62 //
GSP33yasasi_u:621: taṭasthāvasthitā dharmāḥ svarūpaṃ na spṛśanti kim /
GSP33yasasi_u:625: tanniṣṭhasya sārvajñyāderajñatvādeśca daṇḍena kuṇḍalena vopahite kādācitkadaṇḍādiviśeṣaṇavattayā
GSP33yasasi_u:626: taṭasthaśabdite devadatte vartamānasya sukhasya duḥkhasya ca devadattātmanīva brahmaṇi
GSP33yasasi_u:642: brahmabhinnasyānātmatve tattvaṃpadadvayalakṣyārtha eka pratyaktatvaṃ cinmātramava śiṣyate /
GSP33yasasi_u:645: taccaekaśeṣe tu tādātmyaṃ cinmātre naiva sambhavet iti syāt /
GSP33yasasi_u:651: atra yādavaprakāśaprakriyayā bhāṭṭaprakriyayā vā nirūpyate tādātmyamiti bodhyam /
GSP33yasasi_u:653: dharmadvārakabhedaviśiṣṭasvarūpābheda eva ca tādātmyaṃ matamiti vivekaḥ // 65 //
GSP33yasasi_u:663: antye ghaṭo ghaṭa itīti vā bhedābhedavikalpo bodhyaḥ /
GSP33yasasi_u:665: atyantabhinnasyātyantābhinnasya vā bandhe - tādātmyasambandhe asati-aprāmāṇike sati bhavatkṛto 'yaṃ vikalpo 'pārtha ityarthaḥ /
GSP33yasasi_u:666: na hi ghaṭo ghaṭa iti vā ghaṭaḥ paṭa iti vā sāmānādhikaraṇyaṃ dṛṣṭam /
GSP33yasasi_u:670: na ca bhede tayorvirodhādekatra samāveśo na ghaṭata iti vācyam ,
GSP33yasasi_u:672: dharmato bhedaḥ svarūpato 'bheda iti vāvirodha iti bhāvaḥ // 66 //
GSP33yasasi_u:680: etayoḥ-bhedābhedayoḥ svarūpaṃ svarūpabhedamupagamyaiva bhedo 'bhedo veti vikalpakoṭyorbādhanaṃ dūṣaṇaṃ kriyate /
GSP33yasasi_u:691: antye asambaddhasya viśiṣṭabuddhinirvāhakatvaṃ tasya na syāditi vikalpanamapi kaṇṭhaśoṣaṇamātraphalakaṃ pratyakṣānubhavabādhitaṃ cetyarthaḥ
GSP33yasasi_u:695: nīlarūpavati ghaṭādau nīlabuddhiryathā nīlasamavāyāvagāhinī viditā nāpalapyā,
GSP33yasasi_u:709: sphuṭapratipanne saṃyoge dustarkatanmūlavikalpanādi yathā bhramalakṣaṇaṃ kaṇṭhaśoṣaṇamātram ,
GSP33yasasi_u:711: evaṃ nīlotpalāditādātmye pratyakṣe jīvabrahmatādātmye ca śāstrasiddhe dustarkavikalpanādi pratyakṣaśāstradaṇḍanivāritamiti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33yasasi_u:716: pravṛttinimittarūpadharmabhedena dharmisvarūpābhedena ca tādātmyaṃ tattvamasītyādau tvamādiśabdānāṃ tattaccharīrakabrahmaparyantatayā nirūpaṇīyam
GSP33yasasi_u:721: ekaśeṣe hi ciddhātoḥ kasya mokṣaḥ phalaṃ bhavet // 74 //
GSP33yasasi_u:723: etāvatā paramate prātipadikayoriva samānavibhakterapi na mukhyārthateti vyavasthāpitam /
GSP33yasasi_u:725: tathāpi pravṛttinimittadharmabhedaprahāṇānna sāmānādhikaraṇyamukhyārthatā paramata iti bodhyam /
GSP33yasasi_u:728: eṣa brahma praviṣṭo 'smi grīṣme śītamiva hradam itivacanānusāreṇa brahmānandasya hradatvarūpaṇam ,
GSP33yasasi_u:730: brahmānandaṃ hṛdantaḥstha iti pūrvamudritapāṭhastu na samīcīnaḥ /
GSP33yasasi_u:732: paramaphale mokṣe bhoktṛtvāvasthāpannasya svasya vilayaṃ cejjānīyānnābhilaṣyettāmityarthaḥ /
GSP33yasasi_u:739: cinmātrameva brahma jīvasya svarūpamiti cettarhi brahmaṇa evāvidyājīvabhāvādi vaktavyam /
GSP33yasasi_u:744: na hi tasyāmajātāyāṃ naṣṭāyāṃ vākhilaṃ jagat /
GSP33yasasi_u:754: paṭajñānanāśe 'pi anyeṣāṃ ghaṭādibhedānāmupalambhānna paṭajñānāderapi prapañcādhyāsādhiṣṭhānatvaṃ saṃbhavatītyarthaḥ /
GSP33yasasi_u:758: ghaṭādayo hi bhidyante na tu sā cit prakāśanāt // 77 //
GSP33yasasi_u:760: naivaṃ, ghaṭo hi nābhāti sā sphuratyeva tu sphuṭam // 78 //
GSP33yasasi_u:778: tasyātiriktatve tu paṭajñāne tadabhāne 'pi saṃvidobhānamakṣatameveti samuditāśayaḥ // 77 //78 //79 //
GSP33yasasi_u:779: kiñcāsyāḥ svaprakāśāyā nīrūpāyā na hi svataḥ /
GSP33yasasi_u:792: na vastu vastudharmo vā na pratyakṣo na laiṅgikaḥ /
GSP33yasasi_u:812: pratyakṣeṇa bhedagrahaṇābhāvādeva tanmūlāvinābhāvagrahādhīnodayamanumānamapi na bhede pramāṇaṃ bhavediti hṛdayam /
GSP33yasasi_u:823: kiñca svayaṃprakāśasya svato vā parato 'pi vā /
GSP33yasasi_u:830: saṃvidaḥ prāgabhāvaḥ pradhvaṃsābhāvo vā kiṃ tayaiva gṛhyate ?
GSP33yasasi_u:831: uta saṃvidantareṇeti vikalpya prathamaṃ kalpa pratikṣipatisvata iti /
GSP33yasasi_u:840: saṃvinnānātvopagame 'pi na tatprāgabhāvagrahasambhava ityabhyupagamya vādaḥ kṛtaḥ /
GSP33yasasi_u:854: so 'yaṃ saṃvidbhedāvalambī vikalpādivādaḥ saṃvitsvarūpayāthātmyājñānakārya ityadvaitino manyanta ityarthaḥ // 86 //
GSP33yasasi_u:859: śraddhāmātraśaraṇeṣu vineyabuddhiṣu nirūpaṇāsamartheṣu bhavadabhimato 'yaṃ brahmopadeśaḥ śobhate nāma /
GSP33yasasi_u:860: yuktivimarśakā vayaṃ tu nātra bhavadīye brahmopadeśe śraddhālavaḥ /
GSP33yasasi_u:868: ekasminneva viṣaye kālabhedena karaṇabhedena ca dhiyo nānā pratyātmamadhyakṣasiddhāḥ sukhaduḥkhādivadityarthaḥ /
GSP33yasasi_u:872: na hi bhedaḥ svato nāsti nāpratyakṣaśca sammataḥ // 89 //
GSP33yasasi_u:873: nanu yathā nirbhede 'pyākāśe sambandhivyaṅgyo bhedo ghaṭākāśo 'yamayaṃ tu maṭhākāśa iti pratīyate,
GSP33yasasi_u:874: evaṃ saṃvidyapi viṣayāśrayavyaṅgyo bhedo na vāstava iti cettatrāhasambandhīti /
GSP33yasasi_u:876: sa tu kuḍyamusalasaṃyoga iti sambandhibhedenaiva vyāvṛttatayā pratīyamānaḥ saṃyogabhedo vāstava eva sambandhijanyatvāttasya,
GSP33yasasi_u:878: maitrasya paṭecchetyevaṃ sambandhibhedena bhinnatayā pratīyamānā bhinnabhinnaivecchā tattatpuruṣīyā tadā tadā jāyamānā,
GSP33yasasi_u:879: evaṃ viṣayāśrayabhedena pratīyamīnaḥ saṃvidbhedo 'pi vāstavika eva kālādibhedena jāyamāna iti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33yasasi_u:880: siddhānte tattatpuruṣe vartamānasya dharmabhutajñānasyaikatve nityatve 'pi tattadarthaprakāśanārthaprasaraṇāvasthābhedaviśiṣṭaveṣeṇa nānātvamanityatvaṃ ca saṃmataṃ,
GSP33yasasi_u:887: nityavibhunaḥ prakāśakasyaikasya jñānasya sarvaviṣayasambandhe samāne sadā sarvārthasya bhānaprasaṅgaḥ /
GSP33yasasi_u:888: prakāśakajñānasambandhe 'pyabhāne tu kasyacidapi kadāpi bhānaṃ na syāt /
GSP33yasasi_u:897: siddhānte tu saṅkocavikāsābhyāṃ jñānasya viṣayabhede sannidhyasannidhī vyavasthite iti bodhyam // 91 //
GSP33yasasi_u:902: etatkaraṇajanyaṃ jñānametamevārthaṃ gṛhṇātītyevaṃ karaṇabhedenāpi vyavasthā durvacā bhavadbhirityāhanāpīti /
GSP33yasasi_u:910: eva caitanyaṃ taṃ tamarthaṃ prakāśayatīti vyavasthā ghaṭata iti cet ;
GSP33yasasi_u:916: nanu naḥ saṃvido bhinnaṃ sarvaṃ nāma na kiñcana /
GSP33yasasi_u:918: sarvasya sarvadā bhānaprasaṅgaṃ siddhāntinodbhāvitamākṣipati paraḥnanu iti /
GSP33yasasi_u:919: saṃvidbhinnasya sarvasya virahādevāsmanmate sarvaṃ sadā bhāyāditya sthānaṃ'nuyogo bhavatāmityarthaḥ // 94 //
GSP33yasasi_u:920: idamākhyāhi bhoḥ kiṃ nu nīlādirna prakāśate /
GSP33yasasi_u:921: prakāśamāno nīlādiḥ saṃvido vā na bhidyate // 95 //
GSP33yasasi_u:924: uta nīlādeḥ saṃvidabhinnatvena tatpratītiḥ saṃvitpratītirevābhimanyata ityarthaḥ // 95 //
GSP33yasasi_u:928: nānāpratītinihnive nānāpadapadārthapratītinirvāhyaḥ sarvo laukiko vaidikaśca vyavahāraḥ pratītisubhagaḥ-abādhitānubhavasiddhaḥ samyaṅ nirvyūḍho bhavedbhavadbhirityupālambhaḥ /
GSP33yasasi_u:940: bhinnatvenābhinnatvena vā nirūpayitumaśakyatvaṃ ca tasyā avidyāvilāsatvāt bhedābhedayoranirūpaṇaṃ yasyā bhedābhedānirūpaṇā /
GSP33yasasi_u:941: āvidyāsya nīlādibhedasya mithyātvāt mithyārthe ca durghaṭatvasya bhūṣaṇatvādbhedābhedānirūpaṇopapattiḥ /
GSP33yasasi_u:942: upapattyananuvartitvādeva ca sarvaṃ sadā bhāyādityādyāpatterapyanavakāśa iti hṛdayam /
GSP33yasasi_u:946: avidyā hi nyāyānalaspṛṣṭā jātuṣavanna jīvituṃ prabhavati /
GSP33yasasi_u:958: tathā ca svayamevālabdhasattāvidyā kathaṃ prapañcavyavasthāpikā bhavedityākūtam /
GSP33yasasi_u:964: arthānarthāntaratvādivikalpo 'syā na yujyataiti vacanaṃvidyātor'thāntaramasāviti ca vacanaṃ mitho viruddhamiti yāvat // 99 //100 //
GSP33yasasi_u:973: tathā ca śuddhājaḍasaṃvidapekṣayā vikārāspadāśuddhajaḍāvidyāyā bheda eva paramārthataḥ kuto na nirūpyata ityarthaḥ /
GSP33yasasi_u:974: tathā ca paramārthāvidyāvilāso bhedaḥ sarvo 'pi saṃvida ekasyā eva sakalārthaprakāśakatve sarvadā bhāseteti doṣastadavastha iti bhāvaḥ // 102
GSP33yasasi_u:976: sā vidyā kiṃ nu saṃvittirvedyaṃ vā veditāthavā // 103 //
GSP33yasasi_u:979: tatra pratiyogibhūtā vidyā kiṃrūpeti vikalpanaṃ vimarśanārtham // 103 //
GSP33yasasi_u:983: tatra vidyāyā vedyarūpatve veditṛsvarūpatve vā doṣamāhavedyatve iti /
GSP33yasasi_u:993: divākarakaravyāpte deśe divākare vā tadvirodhino 'ndhatamasasyeva vibhvyā saṃvidā vyāpte sarvatra saṃvidi vā nāvidyāyāḥ samāveśasambhava ityarthaḥ
GSP33yasasi_u:1002: avidyāyā aparamārthatvena tadanāditve 'pi nāsmadabhimatādvaitoparodha iti cedatra bramaḥ-anāditvenopagamyamānāyā avidyāyāḥ kalpakadoṣāntarāyogenāpāramārthyāyogaḥ
GSP33yasasi_u:1003: brahmaṇa eva tatkalpakadoṣatve durghaṭatvena hetvantarānapekṣatve vā muktāvapi tatprasaṅgaḥ /
GSP33yasasi_u:1007: jīvasya, ko jīvo yasya seti cet /
GSP33yasasi_u:1013: na vidyate samādhānaṃ yasya tadasamādhānam - asamādheyam /
GSP33yasasi_u:1015: tasmin siddha evāvidyāsiddhiriti jīvāvidyāpakṣe paramate 'nyonyāśrayo 'samādheyaḥ prasajatītyarthaḥ /
GSP33yasasi_u:1017: kintu bhavatāmeveti dyotyate te iti nirdeśena /
GSP33yasasi_u:1020: bījāṅkura nyāyena sa doṣaḥ parihārya ityatrāhane ti /
GSP33yasasi_u:1024: brahmaṇaścenna sarvajñaṃ kathaṃ tat baṃbhramīti te(bhoḥ) /
GSP33yasasi_u:1030: sarvaṃ sarvadā sarvathā yathāvasthitaṃ svataḥ sākṣātkurvatastasya nānāvidhabhrāntilakṣaṇāvidyāśrayatvaṃ viruddhatvānna sambhavatītyarthaḥ /
GSP33yasasi_u:1036: avidyāmūlāhaṅkāranibandhanatā ca brahmaniṣṭhasya sārvajñyasya na ghaṭate,
GSP33yasasi_u:1037: parāsya śaktirvividhaiva śrūyate svābhāvikī jñānabalakriyā ceti tasyānanyopādhikatvaśravaṇādityarthaḥ /
GSP33yasasi_u:1055: te śabdāntarādayaḥ śāstrabhedakāḥ-tattadvidhivākyasya vibhinnavibhinnavidheyakatvena bhedavyavasthāpakāḥ bhedakapramāṇabhūtāstāntrikairmatāḥ,
GSP33yasasi_u:1057: tathā sarvajñatāpi pāramārthikārthabhedagocarā yathārthaiva kiṃ na syādityarthaḥ // 111 //
GSP33yasasi_u:1060: parabrahmaṇi parameśvare svataḥ sarvajñe 'vidyāyā asambhava uktaḥ /
GSP33yasasi_u:1063: vindeta padaṃ gabhastimālinīvāndhatamasaṃ tarhi na tasyā nivartakamanyatkiñcidapi
GSP33yasasi_u:1073: tathā cāmananti sma parāśarabhaṭṭapādāḥetadrāmāstraṃ dalayatu kalibrahmamīmāṃsakāṃśca jñaptirbrahmaitajjavaladapi nijāvidyayā bambhramīti /
GSP33yasasi_u:1074: tasya bhrāntiṃ tāṃ ślathayati jitādvaitavidyastu jīvo yadyaddṛśyaṃ tadvitathamiti ye jñāpayāñcakrurajñāḥ //
GSP33yasasi_u:1078: nanu bhedakapramāṇānāṃ sarvajñatvādivacanānāmapi vyāvahārikārthabhedagocarāṇāṃ vyāvahārikameva pramāṇyam /
GSP33yasasi_u:1081: tatra jīveśvarādibhedo 'pyavidyayā vinānupapanna iti brahmāśritaiva sānāyatyā mantavyeti śaṅkate sarvajñatvādīti /
GSP33yasasi_u:1086: sāmānādhikaraṇyaśrutīnāṃ ca sarvaśarīrakasarvātmabhūtabrahmaikyaparatvamiti na jīvabhāvādikalpikāvidyā brahmaṇyupagantavyeti ca hārdam /
GSP33yasasi_u:1097: saditi sattāmātramekarasaṃ svaprakāśarūpaṃ brahma kathaṃ svaviṣayakāvidyāyatanaṃ bhavedākārabhedābhāvāditi bhāvaḥ /
GSP33yasasi_u:1100: brahmatvena viṣaya iti cedayaṃ rūpabhedaḥ kathamāyātastatra ?
GSP33yasasi_u:1103: svābhāviko 'yamiti tu na vaktuṃ śakyate saviśeṣatvabhiyā parairiti bhāvaḥ jīvāvidyāpakṣa ivātrāpyanyonyāśra iti punarityanena dyotyate // 114
GSP33yasasi_u:1122: kiñcāvidyā na cet ... (vastu vyavahāryaṃ kathaṃ bhavet ) /
GSP33yasasi_u:1123: nāpyavastviti co....... (ktau tu vastutvaṃ sidhyati dhruvam ) /
GSP33yasasi_u:1126: ato na vastu nā... (vastu na sadvācyaṃ na cāpyasat ) /
GSP33yasasi_u:1129: dṛśyamānaśakalānusandhānataḥ avidyāyā na vastutvaṃ nāpyavastutvamiti pakṣasya pratikṣepaḥ kṛto 'tretyunnayāmaḥ /
GSP33yasasi_u:1133: avidyā sā kimekaiva naikā vā tadidaṃ vada //
GSP33yasasi_u:1134: tadāśrayaśca saṃsārī tathaiko naika eva vā // 122 //
GSP33yasasi_u:1142: śuko mukto, vāmadevo mukta iti khalu śrautīprasiddhiḥ /
GSP33yasasi_u:1143: tathā ca śukasya brahmavidyayaiva prapañcaheturekāvidyā vinaṣṭeti prapañcānuvṛttiranupapannā /
GSP33yasasi_u:1145: bādhitaṃ hi svayameva nivartsyati kañcitkālamanuvartamānamapīti bhāvaḥ // 123 //
GSP33yasasi_u:1173: svāvidyāparikalpitatvaṃ tava prapañcasya ca sādhayannanyastulyanayena tvayā kathaṃ pratikṣepya ityarthaḥ /
GSP33yasasi_u:1176: sugato yadi sarvajñaḥ kapilo neti kā pramā /
GSP33yasasi_u:1177: ubhau ca yadi sarvajñau buddhibhedaḥ kathaṃ tayoḥ //
GSP33yasasi_u:1178: iti nyāyena parasparavirodhādubhayamapi paramārthato na sidhyatīti yāvat /
GSP33yasasi_u:1179: yadvā sarveṣāṃ jñānā jīvānāmaikyasya siddhirivānyasya sarvasyaikāvidyākalpitatvasyāpi siddhirna setsyati /
GSP33yasasi_u:1185: tvāṃ cānye tvadīyā eveti sundopasundanyāyaparāhataṃ yuṣmanmatamiti bhāvaḥ // 129 //
GSP33yasasi_u:1187: tathaiva bhavato 'pīti vyartho mokṣāya te śramaḥ // 130 //
GSP33yasasi_u:1199: tathā bhavatāṃ tataḥ paścādbhāvinyapi sā mithyā,
GSP33yasasi_u:1220: ayaṃ bhāvaḥ - yadyapi muktirnityasiddhā brahmavidyayā notpādyā,
GSP33yasasi_u:1222: sata evāprakāśamānatvenāsata iva sthitasyābhivyaktyarthaḥ prayatno yathā loke saphalo dṛṣṭastatheti // 135 //136 //137 //
GSP33yasasi_u:1225: saṃvit kiṃ saiva kiṃ vāhaṃ brahmāsmītīti kīdṛśī /
GSP33yasasi_u:1234: iti kīdṛśī-ityevaṃ jijñāsitaprakārābrahmāsmītīti vṛttidhīriti vā pāṭhaḥ syāt /
GSP33yasasi_u:1238: nanu te brahmavidyā sā saiva tasyāḥ phalaṃ katham // 140 //
GSP33yasasi_u:1241: na hi brahmavidyāsādhyaṃ prakāśāntaraṃ muktau bhavateṣyate /
GSP33yasasi_u:1247: nityaśuddhabuddhamuktātmasvabhāvasyābhivyaktirvṛttirūpā cettasyā utpādavināśayogitvāttannivṛttau punaravidyā samunmiṣediti saṃsṛtibhayānativṛttiprasaṅga ityarthaḥ /
GSP33yasasi_u:1248: nanu pūrvāvidyāṃ vināśya vidyā svayamapi naśyati /
GSP33yasasi_u:1249: avidyānivṛttyā ca na punarbhavaprasaṅga iti cet ;
GSP33yasasi_u:1250: atra brūmaḥ - anādibhāvasya nāśāyogāt tattvasākṣātkāreṇāvidyāyā nātyantikocchedaḥ śakyakriyaḥ /
GSP33yasasi_u:1251: sāvaśeṣocchede tu sūkṣmarūpeṇāvasthitāyāstasyā abhivyakternivṛttau punaḥ sthūlatayonmeṣaprasaṅgaḥ /
GSP33yasasi_u:1252: na cānādibhāvarūpāyā api mithyātvādeva ātyantikocchedaḥ kriyate vidyayeti vācyam ,
GSP33yasasi_u:1256: kāryaṃ na jāyate yena tamāhuḥ pratibandhakam // 142 //
GSP33yasasi_u:1270: saṃsāriṇaśca viṣayaprāvaṇyadasāyāṃ tattvasākṣātkārapuṣkalakāraṇasampattetevāsiddhyā tadanudaya iti na tatrāpi pratibandhakatvaṃ tasyā ghaṭata ityarthaḥ /
GSP33yasasi_u:1272: siddhānte tu vidyāprāgabhāvarūpāyā avidyāyā na vidyāpratibandhakatvam /
GSP33yasasi_u:1274: vidyāmāhātmyācca bandhakakarmanivṛttau karmaṇā saṅkucitaprasaraṇasya svābhāvikamasaṅkucitaṃ prasaraṇaṃ dharmabhūtajñānasya sadā muktāviti viśeṣo bodhyaḥ /
GSP33yasasi_u:1275: atra pare pratyavatiṣṭheran - nanvasmanmate 'pi vastutattvāviśadaprakāśakarī nānābhramaheturavidyānādiriṣyate /
GSP33yasasi_u:1280: brahmasvarūpabhinnatve viśadaprakāśasya brahmaṇaḥ saviśeṣatvaprasaṅgāttadabhinnatve vācye 'nutpādyatvādeva tasya tatpratirodhakatvāyogānnādyaḥ kalpaḥ /
GSP33yasasi_u:1283: prakāśastvanuvartata iti ca nirviśeṣavādinā vaktuṃ na śakyate /
GSP33yasasi_u:1284: kiñca viśadaprakāśapratirodhikāyāṃ satyāmavidyāyāṃ kathaṃ sākṣātkāro bhavet ?
GSP33yasasi_u:1290: naca nivṛttāvidyatvameva svarūpaprakāśasya svarūpaprakāśasya vaiśadyamiti vācyam ,
GSP33yasasi_u:1291: svaprakāśamātravapuṣi sadā vidyotamāne nirviśeṣe cinmātre brahmaṇi avidyānvayāyogātpragapi vaiśadyasyaivopagantavyatvāt /
GSP33yasasi_u:1292: durghaṭatvāttatra padamañcatyavidyeti cettarhi tata eva muktāvapyavidyānvayaprasaktiriti muktasyāpi bhayaṃ bhavedeveti // 142 // 143 //144 //145
GSP33yasasi_u:1299: tathā ca mithyābhūtasyaikasyānekasya vā jīvasyopagame na viśeṣo vinābhiniveśādityarthaḥ // 146 //
GSP33yasasi_u:1303: āhosvinnānātvena bhāsamānasyāpi tasya yuktyaikatvaṃ niṣkṛṣyata iti vikalpamabhipretyādyaṃ kalpaṃ dūṣayatiprādibhāsikamiti /
GSP33yasasi_u:1307: nānājīvabhānasya na vyavahāhakāla eva bādhyatvaṃ śuktirūpyāderivetyāhaāsaṃsāreti /
GSP33yasasi_u:1310: ayamāśayaḥ-yathā svāpnārthavyavahārāṇāṃ svapna evāsattvaṃ pāścātyabādhānniścīyate vyavahāradaśāyāmeva,
GSP33yasasi_u:1312: kintvanyajīvakṛtasyopakārasyāpakārasya vā sattvapratītyaiva āprājñādābālagopālaṃ tadanuguṇapravṛttisaṃrambho dṛśyate 'nuvartamāna āpralayāt
GSP33yasasi_u:1328: 'nye dehino 'pi sa sa svātmeva svaśarīrapravṛttyanuguṇajñānādimān pratyātmasiddho
GSP33yasasi_u:1331: paraśarīrāṇisātmakāni ceṣṭāvattvāt svaśarīravaditi sātmakatve 'numite tadātmanāṃ svātmabhedaḥ pariśeṣāt sidhyati,
GSP33yasasi_u:1333: svāsamavetatvaṃ ca tasya svasya tadā bhinnasaṅkalpapravṛttimattvādeva suniśceyamiti bodhyam // 149 //
GSP33yasasi_u:1339: ānumānāḥ anumānaprayojakāḥ sapakṣadṛṣṭāḥ vahnayo 'numeyātparvatīyavahneryathā bhinnāḥ vyāptigrahaṇakāle 'dhyakṣitāḥ,
GSP33yasasi_u:1348: paradeheṣu parātmanaśceṣṭāviśeṣairanukūlapratikūlodāsīnānūhitvaiva hi tattadanuguṇā vyavahārāḥ dṛṣṭā loke,
GSP33yasasi_u:1380: nanu śarīrabhede 'pyātmaikyātpratisandhāne janmāntare 'nubhūtasyāpi janmāntare pratisandhānaṃ syādityatrāhaprāyaṇāditi /
GSP33yasasi_u:1382: janmabhede ca maraṇanarakagarbhavāsajanmakālaprabhavakleśabāhulyena saṃskāravināśātpūrvajanmānubhūtasmaraṇaṃ janmāntare ca jāyata ityarthaḥ
GSP33yasasi_u:1384: jīvanādṛṣṭabalāttu saṃskāraviśeṣasyāvinaṣṭatvaṃ jātamātra udbhūtatvaṃ ca kalpyate /
GSP33yasasi_u:1390: ekakṣaṇa eva jāyamāneṣu nānāsukhaduḥkhānubhaveṣu kāladairghyādisaṃskārapramoṣakavirahe 'pi asmaraṇādi ātmanāmasaṅkarāt anakyādeva vyavasthāpyam
GSP33yasasi_u:1400: te ca svasvāvidyākalpitaṃ padārthajātaṃ paśyanti pṛthak pṛthak svapna iva /
GSP33yasasi_u:1401: vyāvahārikā anye jīvā anyena na jñāyante /
GSP33yasasi_u:1403: atra cānyaṃ jīvaṃ tadguṇadoṣādi vā vyāvahārikamanyo jīvastathābhūto na jānāti cettarhi
GSP33yasasi_u:1410: tatra ca doṣa ukta eveti hārdam // 156 //157 //
GSP33yasasi_u:1413: saṃvinmātre 'vidyākalpito meyamātṛbheda iti paramataṃ vistareṇa pratikṣiptametāvatā /
GSP33yasasi_u:1416: bhavadabhimataireva dharmaiḥ saviśeṣatvaṃ saṃvidaḥ prasajyata iti bhāvaḥ // 158 //
GSP33yasasi_u:1421: svarūpābhedātteṣāṃ na saṃvidaḥ sadharmatvamiti śaṅkāmanūdya nirācaṣṭesaṃvideveti /
GSP33yasasi_u:1423: vivādāt svarūpabhedācca teṣāṃ dharmāṇāṃ saṃvitto na saṃpratipannasaṃvidabhinnatvaṃ
GSP33yasasi_u:1428: nanvevamapi teṣāmaparamārthatvātparamārthadvitīyarāhityaṃ surakṣitameveti cettatrāhana ca te iti /
GSP33yasasi_u:1429: tavāpi tattvedamparaśrutyantasiddhāste dharmāssaṃvido nityatvādaya ityeva matam /
GSP33yasasi_u:1431: teṣāṃ bādhe tulyanayena saṃvido 'pi bādhaḥ syāditi dyotyate tattvāvedaketyādinā // 160 //
GSP33yasasi_u:1455: atyantābhede 'natiriktārthakatvātānando brahma satyaṃ jñānamanantaṃ brahmetyādau sahapāṭhasyānarthakyaṃ prasajyate /
GSP33yasasi_u:1456: na hi ghaṭaḥ kalaśa iti sahapāṭhaḥ /
GSP33yasasi_u:1458: dvitīye kalpe tu brahmaṇaḥ saviśeṣatvaprasaṅga ityāhadvitīyaiti /
GSP33yasasi_u:1463: pratyekaśo brahmatvamityatra nānā brahma prasajyate satyaṃ brahma,
GSP33yasasi_u:1473: atiriktatve sāṃśatvaṃ guṇatvaṃ ca prasajyate brahmaṇa iti bhāvaḥ // 165 //
GSP33yasasi_u:1475: tena na kvāpi vākyārtho vibhāgo 'sti nidarśanam // 166 //
GSP33yasasi_u:1480: kintu ravyādivyapadeśagocarārthasyāsādhāraṇākārapradarśanapara iti nirviśeṣādvaitarūpo 'khaṇḍaḥ samānādhikaraṇavākyārtho nidarśanabhūto naivāstītibhāvaḥ
GSP33yasasi_u:1500: apohānāṃ sattve taiḥ sataḥ sadvitīyatā syādityarthaḥ /
GSP33yasasi_u:1506: tathātve ca ghaṭādibhyo brahmāpi na viśiṣyate // 169 //
GSP33yasasi_u:1509: asadvyatireke ca sattvaṃ vyavasthitamiti sadasadbhinnatvaṃ kasyāpi na sambhavatīti pūrvamevoktamityarthaḥ /
GSP33yasasi_u:1511: apohānāṃ brahmasvarūpatve sadasadvilakṣaṇatve ca brahmaṇaḥ sadasadvilakṣaṇatvaṃ prasajyate prapañcasyeveti bhāvaḥ // 169 //
GSP33yasasi_u:1515: jaḍādivyāvartakadharmabodhanamantarā jaḍādivyāvṛttirna pratipādayituṃ śakyate satyādipadairjaḍādiparyāyapadairiveti vyāvartakadharmabodhakatvamavarjanīyam
GSP33yasasi_u:1535: sati sambhave dharmāntaraṃ veti yathopalambhaṃ vyavasthā /
GSP33yasasi_u:1538: satsvarūpe pratīyamāna eva bhedānāmadhyāsācca tatra tasyaiva netarābhāvarūpatvaṃ sambhavi /
GSP33yasasi_u:1540: avidyānivṛtau viśadaṃ bhāsamāne tu na sa iti viśadasvarūpasyābhāvarūpatvaṃ sambhavatīti vācyam /
GSP33yasasi_u:1542: svarūpātiriktatve tu tasyaivābhāvarūpatvaṃ na svarūpasyeti prasaṅgāt /
GSP33yasasi_u:1543: kiñca nirviśeṣe svaprakāśe vastuni viśādāviśadabhānameva durvacam /
GSP33yasasi_u:1557: atha prapañcasyāpi prasaṅgātsadasadanirvacanīyatvaṃ paramataṃ nirasyati bhūte tyādinā /
GSP33yasasi_u:1559: svasvaprameyaṃ yathāyathaṃ tattadasādhāraṇākārato vijātīyasajātīyāntaravyattamavagamayanti pratyakṣādīnīti prasiddham /
GSP33yasasi_u:1562: yathāgrataḥ sthite nīle nīlimānyakathā na, dhīḥ /
GSP33yasasi_u:1563: ekākārā , na hi tathā sphaṭike dhavake matiḥ // 174 //
GSP33yasasi_u:1578: tattadvastvasādhāraṇākārabhede 'bādhitapratītimuktvā vyavahāramapi tādṛśamupanyasyati pramāṇatayā vyavahārā iti /
GSP33yasasi_u:1580: satyaṃ pratītirastyasyā mūlaṃ nāstīti cenna tat /
GSP33yasasi_u:1581: sā cedasti tasyā mūlaṃ kalpyatāṃ kāryabhūtayā // 176 //
GSP33yasasi_u:1588: aikyāyogācca bhedo na pratyakṣa iti yo bhramaḥ /
GSP33yasasi_u:1590: aduṣṭendriyādereva mitiyāthārthye hetutvamanvayavyatirekasiddhaṃ nāpalapyaṃ cetyāha kḷpta miti /
GSP33yasasi_u:1591: vastubhedo nirduṣṭendriyarūpeṇa pratyakṣapramāṇenaiva gṛhyate iti yāvat /
GSP33yasasi_u:1598: prathamamadhikaraṇasvarūpaṃ gṛhītvāthaṃ bhedaṃ gṛhṇātīti kramo 'pi na sambhavati ,
GSP33yasasi_u:1608: tayoḥ svarūpayāthātmyājñānaprayukto niruktavidhaḥ pareṣāṃ bhrama ityarthaḥ // 177 // 178 //
GSP33yasasi_u:1614: yathā kambugrīvādimattvameva ghaṭasya paṭādbheda iti bhāvaḥ // 179 //
GSP33yasasi_u:1618: yathā bhūtalasvarūpajñānameva ghaṭādyanupalambhe sati tattatsmaraṇasahakāri ghaṭādiśūnyatāvyavahārasādhanaṃ matamabhāvasyādhikaraṇasvarūpatvavādināṃ tathetyarthaḥ /
GSP33yasasi_u:1620: ekasyaiva pritayogibhedena nānāvyavahārasādhanatvaṃ nidarśanamukhena draḍhayati hrasve ti /
GSP33yasasi_u:1621: ekatraiva ṣaḍaṅgulimite vastuni tadapekṣayādīrghaṃ pādarthāntaramapekṣya hrasvavyavahāraṃ
GSP33yasasi_u:1622: hrasvaṃ tadapekṣya dīrghavyavahāraṃ ca tadvastujñānameva tattatpratiyogismaraṇasahakāreṇa
GSP33yasasi_u:1636: eṣāṃ ca tattatpratiyogyuparaktatvena vyavahāre punastattatpratiyogismaraṇāpekṣeti viveko 'tra bodhyaḥ // 181 //
GSP33yasasi_u:1639: evaṃ bhedaprapañcasya sattva eva pratyakṣaṃ pramāṇam ,
GSP33yasasi_u:1641: śāstrasyāpi na tatra prāṇāṇyamityāha āgama iti /
GSP33yasasi_u:1648: siddhārthe śāstrasya pramāṇabhāve satyapi śāstrasya pramāṇaśabdamātrasya vā nānirvacanīyatvādau pramāṇatvam ,
GSP33yasasi_u:1650: tat tatpratipādakatayeva pratīyamāno 'pi sandarbho 'viruddhārthaparatayā neya iti hārdam // 182 //
GSP33yasasi_u:1656: athānumānasyāpi sadasadanirvacanīyatve na pramāṇatvamityāha nāsa diti /
GSP33yasasi_u:1657: prapañcaḥ sadasadbhinnaḥ pratīyamānatve sati bādhyamānatvāditi yuktirapi na satī,
GSP33yasasi_u:1658: prapañca sadasattvavān tata evetyābhāsa samānayogakṣematvāditi bhāvaḥ /
GSP33yasasi_u:1663: mithyā vā paramārtho vā nādyaḥ kalpo 'yamañjasā // 184 //
GSP33yasasi_u:1667: pramāṇābhāvāddūṣitaṃ sadasadanirvacanīyatvarūpaṃ mithyātvaṃ prakārāntareṇāpi dūṣayati kiñceti /
GSP33yasasi_u:1670: naca bhedamithyātvaṃ satyaṃ brahmasvarūpameveti nādvaitahānyādīti vācyam //
GSP33yasasi_u:1674: evaṃ mithyātvaṃ nirasya bhedaprapañcasya satyatvaṃ vyavasthāpayan parābhimataṃ sadadvaitaṃ pratikṣeptumupakramate sarvāṇyeveti /
GSP33yasasi_u:1678: sā tadā tasya nābhāvaṃ paṭatvaṃ vānumanyate // 187 //
GSP33yasasi_u:1681: ihedānīṃ ghaṭo 'stīti pratītistadānīṃ tatra svāsādhāraṇākāreṇa ghaṭasya sattāmevāvagāhate ,
GSP33yasasi_u:1684: tathā cāsadvyāvṛttaṃ sadantaravyāvṛttaṃ ca vastunaḥ santaṃ ghaṭādikameva pratipādayanti pratītayaḥ ghaṭo 'sti ,
GSP33yasasi_u:1687: nanvastīti yaduktaṃ kiṃ tanmātraṃ ghaṭa ityapi /
GSP33yasasi_u:1693: stor'thāntaraṃ cettena bodhyate tarhi ghaṭāderāpatitaṃ sadasada nirvācya tvam pratītibalāccāsadvyāvṛttiriti bhāvaḥ // 188 //
GSP33yasasi_u:1697: asti brahme tyupaniṣatpratipādyamapi brahmatulyanayātsadasadanirvacanīyaṃ prasajyate ityarthaḥ // 189 //
GSP33yasasi_u:1712: tasya sarvasya tathā - tvadupadarśitarītyā tatprakārarāhityaṃ prasajyatā ityarthaḥ // 191 //
GSP33yasasi_u:1716: tatra ghaṭāderbhedasyāropitatvaṃ ca parābhimataṃ pratikṣipanniva svābhimatārthaṃ pratipādayati tasmāditi /
GSP33yasasi_u:1719: svaiḥsvairvyavasthitai rūpaiḥ padārthānāṃ tu yā sthitiḥ /
GSP33yasasi_u:1720: sā sattā na svatantra'nyā tatrādvaitakathā katham // 193 //
GSP33yasasi_u:1723: vijātīya sajātīyāntaravyāvartakena svasvāsādhāraṇākāreṇa tasya tasya padārthasya yā sthitiḥ - kālasambandhaḥ pramāṇasambandho vā ,
GSP33yasasi_u:1727: tatsattāyāṃ svatantratvamadvaitaṃ ca bhavadabhimataṃ naiva yuktamiti bhāvaḥ // 193 //
GSP33yasasi_u:1730: tenāpi sādhitaṃ kiñcit saṃvido 'sti na vā tvayā /
GSP33yasasi_u:1731: asti cet pakṣapātaḥ syāt na cette viphalaḥ śramaḥ // 195 //
GSP33yasasi_u:1732: evaṃ prameyabhūtasannānātvaṃ vyavasthāpya pramitinānātvamapi vyavasthāpayati parābhimatacidadvaitanirāsena naceti /
GSP33yasasi_u:1733: viṣayāśrayaviśeṣaiḥ pratyakṣādisvagataviśeṣaiścānubhūyamānaṃ saṃvinnānātvamapi na kṣeptuṃ śakyamityarthaḥ /
GSP33yasasi_u:1734: atra paraiḥ saṃvido nirviśeṣatve proktamanumānamanūdya pratikṣipati na vedya miti /
GSP33yasasi_u:1735: saṃvidi nirviśeṣatvarūpaḥ sādhyadharma upagamyate na vā ,
GSP33yasasi_u:1736: upagamyate cennirnimitta ekasmin dharme pakṣapātaste prasajyate - eko dharma upadamyate ,
GSP33yasasi_u:1748: svarasto viṣayāśrayasvagataviśeṣairviśiṣṭā vilakṣaṇatvena sphuṭaṃ pratīyamānāḥ saṃvidaḥ yathāvasthitairvabāhyair ghaṭādibhirarthairnaikyaṃ yāntītyarthaḥ
GSP33yasasi_u:1753: etacchlokasyottarārdhaṃ na cāsti citisāmānyaṃ sarvasaṃvedanāspada miti vā na cidasti sasāmānyaṃ sarvasaṃvedanāspada miti vā sambhāvyate /
GSP33yasasi_u:1757: viśeṣeṇa sahopalambhasya vyabhicāre 'pi citsāmānyena sahopalambhaniyamo 'stīti cet ,
GSP33yasasi_u:1760: yathāmudritapāṭhe tvayamarthaḥ - sahopalambhaniyamo na siddhayati cet sarvaṃ sasāmānyaviseṣaṃ jñātṛjñeyātmakaṃ jñeyajātaṃ jñānabhinnatayāstyevetyarthaḥ
GSP33yasasi_u:1762: ayaṃ ślokaḥ sahopalambhaniyamā dityādinā prapañca sphuṭamañcatī tyantena anūdyamānaparapakṣa pratikṣepabhāge susaṅgataḥ /
GSP33yasasi_u:1764: ayaṃ ca śloko jñeyajñātroḥ saṃvidaikyasādha kasahopalambhaniyamarūpahetorasiddhipratipādaka iti dhyeyam // 197 //
GSP33yasasi_u:1774: arthaprakāśe niyamena saṃvido bhānāsiddhyarthaṃ tasyāḥ svaprakāśatvamāha yadetaditi /
GSP33yasasi_u:1775: svayamprakāśatāpravṛttinimittakaḥ śabdo yasya tat svayaṃprakāśatāśabdaṃ svayaṃprakāśaśabdavācyam /
GSP33yasasi_u:1778: saṃvitprakāśābhāver'thasyāpi na prakāśa iti saṃvitprakāśābhāvavyāpakābhāvapratiyogiprakāśasyārthasya saṃvidananyatvaṃ sidhyati,
GSP33yasasi_u:1794: balavattarapratyakṣapramāṇasaṃrakṣyamāṇā ete na tvadīyasaṃvidaikyānumānānuvartino jñātṛjñeyabhedā ityarthaḥ /
GSP33yasasi_u:1796: artheṣu saṃvidaikyasādhanārthaṃ hi arthānāṃ saṃvidaśca svarūpagrahaṇaṃ tāvadapekṣitam /
GSP33yasasi_u:1797: tata eva ca mithasteṣāṃ bhedo 'pi siddha iti pratyakṣabādhitamanumānaṃ na pravartata ityarthaḥ /
GSP33yasasi_u:1805: atra śrīparaśarabhaṭṭāryaśrīsūktiranusandheyā ahamidamabhivedmītyātmabittyorvibhede sphurati yadi tadaikyaṃ bāhyamapyekamastu /
GSP33yasasi_u:1806: pramitirapi mṛṣā syātanmeyamithyātvavāde yadi tadapi saheran dīrdhamasmanmatāyuḥ iti // 202 //
GSP33yasasi_u:1811: vahneranuṣṇatvānumānamiva pratyakṣabādhitamarthajñātroḥ saṃvidaikyānumānaṃ bhavadīyamiti proktaṃ bhavati // 203 //
GSP33yasasi_u:1813: tavāpi na hi saṃvittiḥ svātmanā saha bhāsate // 204 //
GSP33yasasi_u:1814: kañci sāhityaṃ bhedaniyataṃ jñānārthayorhetughaṭakaṃ tadabhedasādhane viruddhamityāha kiñce ti /
GSP33yasasi_u:1815: saṃvitsaṃvidā sahopalabhyata iti hi tavāpi na sammatam /
GSP33yasasi_u:1816: tatsaṃvidā tatsaṃvidā sahopalabhyamānamarthajātaṃ niyamena tadbhinnameva bhavediti yāvat // 204 //
GSP33yasasi_u:1828: arthaṃ vinā saṃvido bhāne tāṃ vinār'thasyāpi bhānaṃ siddhiprāyamiti sahopalambhanirūpabhavaduktahetvasiddhiriti
GSP33yasasi_u:1839: ghaṭādṛte bhātātatpaṭādṛte bhānaṃ ghaṭasya yathā sidhyati ,
GSP33yasasi_u:1840: tathār'thaṃ vinābhātājjñānādvinā bhānasarthasya sidhyatīti sahopalambhaniyamo nanīladitaddhiyāṃ sidhyatītyarthaḥ /
GSP33yasasi_u:1841: nanu jñānenaivārthaprakāśasya vācyatvājjñānasya ca svaprakāśatvājjñānabhānaṃ vinārṃ'thabhānaṃ
GSP33yasasi_u:1842: na yujyata iti cedevamapi sahopalambhaniyamo na yujyata eva jñānaviśeṣeṇa jñānasāmānyena vā ,
GSP33yasasi_u:1844: idamartha eva sahopalambhaniyama iti 197 tamaḥ ślokaḥ ,
GSP33yasasi_u:1846: evaṃ mitimātṛmeyabhidāyāthātmyaṃ na nihnotuṃ śakyata iti vyavasthāpi tamatreti dhyeyam // 207 //
GSP33yasasi_u:1850: prajñānidhirguruvaro mama bhūtapuryāṃ rāmānujārya urukīrtīrayaṃ samindhe //
GSP33yasasi_u:1852: aṇṇaṅgarārya iti ca prathitābhidhāno vyākhyābhimāmakaravaṃ prativādibhīkṛta gurupādaprasādena yāmunoktyarṇave tariḥ /
